function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Data transmission failure due to network interruption or device malfunction.","Impact":"Loss of real-time IEQ data and delayed response to contagious disease outbreaks.","Mitigation":"Regular maintenance and testing of the data transmission module, as well as implementing a backup data storage solution.","Technologies":"Automatic network recovery function, 4G and Wi-Fi transmission, and microSD card data storage.","People":"Operators and maintenance staff responsible for the data transmission module.","Owner":"Facility management or IT department."},{"Description":"Inability to visualize real-time IEQ data due to display module malfunction.","Impact":"Difficulty in monitoring and responding to changes in IEQ conditions, potentially leading to undetected contagious disease outbreaks.","Mitigation":"Regular maintenance and testing of the display module, and providing training for staff on alternative monitoring methods.","Technologies":"LED screen with auto on-off function, and backup visualization methods.","People":"Operators and maintenance staff responsible for the display module.","Owner":"Facility management or maintenance department."},{"Description":"Temporary power supply failure leading to data loss or interruption in data transmission.","Impact":"Loss of real-time IEQ data and delayed response to contagious disease outbreaks.","Mitigation":"Regular maintenance and testing of the power module, as well as implementing a backup power supply solution.","Technologies":"Button battery backup, USB Type C power interface, and external power supply monitoring.","People":"Operators and maintenance staff responsible for the power module.","Owner":"Facility management or maintenance department."}]}
